events.description: Bitcoin dropped to $72,800, its lowest level since November 2024.
Nearly 170k traders were liquidated as the selloff intensified.
Global crypto funds saw $1.7 billion in net outflows in a single week.

facts.fact_text: Bitcoin dropped to as low as $72,800 in early February.

evidences.evidence_text: Bitcoin dropped to as low as $72,800 in early February, hitting its lowest levels since November 2024

facts.fact_text: More than $730 million was liquidated over a 24-hour period.

evidences.evidence_text: with more than $730 million liquidated over the past 24 hours

facts.fact_text: Global crypto funds recorded $1.7 billion in net outflows last week.

evidences.evidence_text: Meanwhile, global crypto funds recorded another $1.7 billion in net outflows last week

facts.fact_text: Assets under management have fallen by $73 billion since October 2025.

evidences.evidence_text: assets under management have fallen by $73 billion since peaking in October 2025

claims.claim_text: Bitcoin has been in a multi-month bear market.
claims.author: Matt Hougan

evidences.evidence_text: Bitwise CIO Matt Hougan said bitcoin has been in a multi-month bear market

claims.claim_text: Strong institutional adoption and regulatory clarity have made investors complacent.
claims.author: Matt Hougan

evidences.evidence_text: arguing that strong institutional adoption and greater regulatory clarity have left investors complacent

claims.claim_text: Bitcoin's 40% plunge could deepen and cause lasting damage to companies with large holdings.
claims.author: Michael Burry

evidences.evidence_text: investor Michael Burry warned that bitcoin’s roughly 40% plunge could deepen and inflict lasting damage on companies that have accumulated large holdings

evidence.evidence_text: Bitcoin dropped... as forced liquidations of leveraged positions intensified
global crypto funds recorded another $1.7 billion in net outflows last week, led by US-listed products
inflict lasting damage on companies that have accumulated large holdings over the past year
